Ppmnorm User Manual(0)                   Ppmnorm User Manual(0)





NAME
       ppmnorm - replaced by pnmnorm

DESCRIPTION
       This program is part of Netpbm(1).

       ppmnorm was replaced in Netpbm 9.25 (March 2002) by pnm-
       norm(1).

       pnmnorm is backward compatible with ppmnorm except  that
       for PBM and PGM input, it produced PBM and PGM output.



netpbm documentation       March 2002    Ppmnorm User Manual(0)
